Loading... Authenticating... Attach a file Choose your user name Select file champs21 Dhaka Chittagong Rajshahi Khulna Barisal Sylhet Rangpur

After its launching in October 2010, Champs21.com has been catering to both Bangla and English medium students, primarily offering a self-assessment test service to assess students’ own strengths and weaknesses in Mathematics and Science towards stronger academic foundation. It also enables students to brush up their ‘beyond-textbook’ learning in both Bangla and English languages. Another area of scholastic focus of this approach covers General Knowledge, IQ, and Current Affairs in its extra curriculum section. The inception of Champs21.com took place keeping in mind the following targets:

  • • Bringing about fun, excitement and enjoyment in learning;


  • • opening up the world of internet as a \‘huge free knowledge bank\’ to the students;


  • • bridging the resource-divide, that implies a village student gains access to the same quality of learning as a traditionally more fortunate urban student of a top-school


With realization to all the factor that are there in the system which demands an immediate action for a better educational method, Champs21.com is determined to provide the best standard education in every corner of the country.

Current Version: 1.0.9

1. Applicable Terms

The terms and conditions set forth hereinafter are applicable to all visitors, subscribers or users of the site. The site is branded under the name of ClassTune.

2. Copyright Issue

The site is designed, updated and maintained by ClassTune. ClassTune and the name, design and the web address are exclusive property of ClassTune. Any copy and/or reproduction in any form and/or unauthorized access to any data forming part of the site will amount to infringement of copyright laws and international treaty provisions.

3. Information Provided

Information provided on this site is on \'as is\' basis and/or as collected from various sources, which can be shared with subscribers on request.

4. Liability

While utmost care is taken to provide correct and up to date information, ClassTune does not warrant the accuracy, completeness and timely availability of the information provided on the site and accepts no responsibility or liability for any error or omission in any information provided on the site.

5. Change in Pricing Structure

ClassTune may, at its sole discretion, change the pricing structure at any time without prior intimation. The prices, relevant levies and other charges /discounts given can be changed any time without prior notice. Add-ons to the prices, such as but not limited to, taxes, duties or other levies are payable by recipients of subscription service as per the governing laws of Bangladesh or foreign countries as applicable.

6. Rights to modify, add, delete and/or change the contents

ClassTune reserves the rights to modify, add, delete and/or change the contents and classification and presentation of the information /content at any time as it may in its absolute discretion find to be expedient, and without giving any notice. It is the user\'s responsibility to refer to the currently prevalent terms and/or any change or addition to the same while accessing the site.

7. Preparation of Content

The content in ClassTune has been prepared by ClassTune team. Every effort has been made to ensure that there is no infringement of any copyright. In case any discrepancy is reported corrective action would be taken immediately by ClassTune.

8. Warranty

Though utmost precautions are taken, ClassTune offers no warranty that the contents of the site are free from viruses or any other infection, which has contaminating or destructive properties.

9. Responsibility Regarding Third Party Content

The site provides at many places links to other websites hosted on servers maintained by third parties over which the Site has no control. The site accepts no responsibility as to the validity of contents and shall in no way be liable for any damage/loss arising to users seeking access or using the site.

10. Subscribers Bound by the General Terms and Conditions

All subscribers to the ClassTune site are bound by the general terms and conditions mentioned herein and by the subscription agreement set forth hereinafter and special terms contracted therein.

If two players have the same score, then their play timing will be taken into consideration. At the unlikely event where the score and play timing of two players match, then number of attempts will be taken into consideration. At the very unlikely event where the score, play timing and number of attempts of two players match, then average the lowest timing to answer questions will be taken into consideration. A player can play a specific topic once every 24 hours. In the meantime, she can attempt other quiz topics. Homework Type Select Type Type Homework Title Write Homework Description... "Start Date: " "Due Date: " "Maximum Time: " "Pass Percentage: " Play Result Time Over Attendance Taking class attendance is now easier than ever! Teachers can take attendance in few clicks, and parents get real time notification. Also, it helps school to keep records. Academic Calendar School can share the academic calendar in the beginning of the year with the authority of modification when required. It helps parents to plan family holidays. Lesson Plan Teachers can upload weekly, monthly and yearly lesson plans. It allows students and parents to plan ahead of time. Teacher\'s Routine Now teachers can see their day to day schedule and make plans accordingly. Surely accelerate better outputs. Homework This feature is convenient for everyone! Teachers can assign homework to whole class or individual student. Students now can find homework easily. Set reminder and mark done once completed and parents can keep track of homework assigned to child. Fees Parents can pay fees online using credit card or mobile money. Great tool for monitoring payment and keeping school\'s accounts. Forms All school forms are now available from mobile and web. Fill it up and submit online. Zero crowd in office room thus higher productivity. Meeting Request School admin can organize parents meets and notify parents quickly. Parents can request to meet teachers. Even teachers can request an individual parent for meeting. Report Card Teacher can upload the report card of class tests, exams, projects and students can see it online. Students can place it for parents view and after reviewing parents can send acknowledgement to school. Events Events page keeps everyone updated about date, timing and venue of any event coming up in the school. It also sends necessary reminders. Transport Pick up and drop off time of your child\'s school transport now can be checked online. Any changes in the transport schedule can reach parents in minutes. Routine Teachers and Management can modify routine when necessary and send instant notification. Syllabus Schools are enabled to upload yearly syllabus. Students, Parents and Teachers can refer to syllabus on the go. Notice Any notice without any word limitation can be sent. Its real time and interactive. Instant notification to parents. Leave Applying for leave is now hassle free! Parents can apply for Student’s leave and get notification once granted. Teachers can approve Students leave and can apply for their own leaves also.
